live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39677.summary: Some customers in the Meadows West area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39677.title: July 16 – Winnipeg (Meadows West) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
